content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get ready to add a dash of tradition and a sprinkle of silliness to your holiday décor with the **wheat stitch crochet pickle ornament** crafted in my ***signature wheat stitch™*** 1 texture this festive favorite is quick quirky and guaranteed to put a smile on everyone s face we re keepin it simple and a little silly just like a christmas pickle should be you ll start with a basic chain and work a fun easy 4-row repeat to create a soft textured rectangle once that s done join the long edges to form a tube hello pickle shape seam the top closed and add a twine loop so it can dangle proudly on your christmas tree finish it off with a bit of stuffing and close the bottom boom you ve officially crocheted a holiday legend and don t forget to add one of the adorable and punny printable gift tags for the final flourish perfect for quick handmade gifts white elephant exchanges or adding a touch of cheeky charm to your christmas tree this pickle ornament is as fun to make as it is to share a video tutorial is included 2 **crochet hook ** g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 string for tags 7 fiberfill 8 **yarn ** malabrigo rios 9 - 100% superwash merino wool 210yds/100g **yarn quantities ** 25 yards per pickle **yarn substitutions ** herrschners worsted 8 heathers 10 - 100% acrylic 489yds/226g lion brand heartland 11 - 100% acrylic 251yds/142g herrschners worsted 8 sparkle 12 - 92% acrylic/8% polyester 489ds/226g mary maxim maximum value 13 - 100% acrylic 474yds/227g herrschners supreme worsted 14 - 100% acrylic 169yds/100g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** not critical for this pattern 15 sts and 13 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 15 **sizes ** one size adjustable **skill level ** advanced beginner **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 16 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 17 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 18 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 19 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 20 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 21 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items
